name: Lu (Naga of Lakes)
shortLoreBlurb: Lu (Naga of Lakes) is a spirits from Tibet/Nepal associated with serpents, waters. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.

description: Lu (Naga of Lakes) is a spirits from Tibet/Nepal associated with serpents, waters. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.
